name: Blob Adventures
description:
Cute! Squishy! Smart! What else could you possibly want?!

Help your blobby friends solve their way through a series of puzzles

Be crafty, use your surroundings, and ask your blobs for help. They're friendly!

For optimal experience, download the Windows version below!

Blob Adventures was made for the 2021.1.0 Brackeys Game Jam By SixGames And Unicorn Publicies

Most of the art was made during jam. Some was from the Unity Asset Store, CGTrader and opengameart

 All code was written during the jam
